analysis.description:
DxChainToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/44/0x86acebe62bb2218ddffebd5a1a1f17ff83351e6b.sol#99-100) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x86acebe62bb2218ddffebd5a1a1f17ff83351e6b.sol#209-221)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/44/0x86acebe62bb2218ddffebd5a1a1f17ff83351e6b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/44/0x86acebe62bb2218ddffebd5a1a1f17ff83351e6b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/44/0x86acebe62bb2218ddffebd5a1a1f17ff83351e6b.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
